name: soulfulness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of expressing deep feelings: When you look at the guy's eyes, you can see the soulfulness of his face. There's a depth and a soulfulness to these songs. See
soulful
More examplesFewer examplesThe music has a sympathetic warmth mixed with a carefree and somewhat nostalgic soulfulness.I needed an actor who has some real depth, and some soulfulness.The thing I miss in a lot of younger painters is the passion and soulfulness.
